privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we protect and handle your data

dataController.title: 1. Data Controller
dataController.content:
DocliQ GmbH is the data controller responsible for processing your personal data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

DocliQ GmbH
Musterstraße 123
10115 Berlin, Germany
Email: datenschutz@docliq.de

personal.title: 2.1 Personal Data
personal.content: Name, email address, phone number, date of birth, address, health insurance information (GKV/PKV), EGK number.

health.title: 2.2 Health Data
health.content: Appointment history, symptoms described during booking, medical specialty preferences. This data is classified as special category data under GDPR Art. 9.

usage.title: 2.3 Usage Data
usage.content: Device information, IP address, app usage patterns, language preferences. Collected only with your consent for analytics purposes.

legalBasis.title: 3. Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.content:
We process your data based on:

• **Consent** (Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR) - For marketing communications and analytics
• **Contract performance** (Art. 6(1)(b)) - To provide appointment booking services
• **Legal obligations** (Art. 6(1)(c)) - Medical record retention requirements
• **Legitimate interests** (Art. 6(1)(f)) - Service improvement and fraud prevention
• **Vital interests** (Art. 9(2)(c)) - For health-related data processing

yourRights.title: 4. Your Rights (GDPR Art. 12-22)
yourRights.content: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
yourRights.access: **Right of Access** (Art. 15) - Request a copy of your personal data
yourRights.erasure: **Right to Erasure** (Art. 17) - Request deletion of your data
yourRights.restriction: **Right to Restriction** (Art. 18) - Limit how we use your data
yourRights.portability: **Right to Data Portability** (Art. 20) - Receive your data in a portable format
yourRights.objection: **Right to Object** (Art. 21) - Object to certain processing activities
yourRights.withdraw: **Right to Withdraw Consent** - Withdraw consent at any time without affecting prior processing

retention.title: 5. Data Retention
retention.content:
• **Health records**: 10 years (German medical record retention law)
• **Account data**: Until you request deletion
• **Usage analytics**: 26 months
• **Marketing consent records**: 3 years after withdrawal

transfers.title: 6. Data Transfers
transfers.content: Your data is stored on servers located in Germany. We do not transfer personal data outside the European Economic Area (EEA). If this changes, we will notify you and ensure appropriate safeguards are in place.

security.title: 7. Data Security
security.content:
We implement industry-standard security measures:

• AES-256 encryption for data at rest
• TLS 1.3 encryption for data in transit
• ISO 27001 certified data centers
• Regular security audits and penetration testing

authority.title: Supervisory Authority
authority.content:
You have the right to lodge a complaint with the Berlin Commissioner for Data Protection and Freedom of Information (BlnBDI):

Berliner Beauftragte für Datenschutz
Friedrichstr. 219
10969 Berlin

scope.title: 1. Scope and Provider
scope.content:
These Terms of Service govern your use of the DocliQ mobile application and related services provided by DocliQ GmbH, Musterstraße 123, 10115 Berlin, Germany.

By using DocliQ, you agree to these terms. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.

services.title: 2. Services Description
services.content:
DocliQ provides:

• Medical appointment booking with healthcare providers
• Health record management
• Family member appointment coordination
• Health-related content and recommendations

DocliQ is a technology platform that facilitates connections between patients and healthcare providers. We do not provide medical advice or treatment.

obligations.title: 3. User Obligations
obligations.content:
You agree to:

• Provide accurate and complete information
• Keep your account credentials secure
• Use the service only for lawful purposes
• Not misrepresent your identity or health insurance status
• Cancel appointments you cannot attend at least 24 hours in advance

liability.title: 4. Liability
liability.content:
DocliQ is not liable for:

• Medical advice or treatment provided by healthcare professionals
• Accuracy of information provided by healthcare providers
• Service interruptions due to technical issues or maintenance
• Indirect, incidental, or consequential damages

Our liability is limited to the extent permitted by German law.

termination.title: 5. Termination
termination.content:
You may delete your account at any time through the app settings. We may terminate or suspend your account for violation of these terms.

Upon termination, your data will be handled according to our Privacy Policy and applicable retention requirements.

disputes.title: 6. Dispute Resolution
disputes.content:
These terms are governed by German law. For disputes, the courts of Berlin have exclusive jurisdiction.

For consumer disputes, you may also use the EU Online Dispute Resolution platform: https://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr
